name: bunny beanie
notes:
a miffy inspired hat for all the cutie patooties and bunny babes!

this hat is worked from the brim to the top in the round. there is a chart for the color work design. it will fit ~18-20 inch head circumference. if you'd like to make the hat bigger or smaller, add or subtract 12 stitches from your cast on.

yarn
i used knitting for olive heavy merino in marzipan as the main color, knitting for olive heavy merino in coal as cc1, and loops and threads impeccable in claret as cc2. any 3 worsted (or even aran) weight yarns will work well too!

needles and notions
16 inch/40 cm us 7/4.5 mm circular needles
16 inch/40 cm us 8/5.0 mm circular needles
us 8/5.0 mm double pointed needles
1 stitch marker (optionally, 6 extra markers to separate chart repeats)
tapestry needle
scissors

happy knitting! or perhaps, hoppy knitting!
